title: How To Make Time For Self-care When You're Busy
summary: The best way to start your day with self-care is to set the tone for it. Journaling is a great way to get your thoughts and emotions out of your head and self-exploration. Getting at least seven hours of sleep can greatly impact your physical and mental health. Sleep deprivation is linked to a number of different health issues and can greatly affect your ability to function throughout the day. Find small windows of time to devote to self care and find ways to fit them into your day.
